quote: One of the things psychologists used to say was that if you are depressed, anxious or angry, you couldn't be happy. Those were at opposite ends of a continuum. I believe that you can be suffering or have a mental illness and be happy - just not in the same moment that you're sad.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: I have a piece of great and sad news to tell you: I am dead.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: The monarchy is foremost a business, and it's important to them that the British public continue to finance the excessive luxurious lifestyles of the now quite enormous, wasteful and useless 'royal' family. I find it very sad.
author: Morrissey

quote: I'm always sad to see a relationship not work, but what happens between two people is not my business.
author: Debbie Reynolds

quote: I do not take steroids. I never have. It's sad to me that people want to point fingers. I don't do that. That's not me. I wouldn't feel like a human being.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: It's really sad for me that in the United States the Latino community is losing its culture and language, especially among kids born here - a lot of them can't even speak our language.
author: Romeo Santos

quote: The president we have today is a typical Washington politician that's prone to hyperbole and decisiveness and false outrage. And I think it's very sad - very sad to watch.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: Usually, I'm only sad when something sad happens. I am not a melancholic person. I like to live very much in the present. If I was an animal, I'd be a little cat. They like to live life.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: They say such nice things about people at their funerals that it makes me sad that I'm going to miss mine by just a few days.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: The question I love to get asked is: 'What's the hardest part of your job?' And literally, the answer is probably real sad, but it's to just to be me. Like, it's really hard, because I think people, you know, have a set idea of what a pop star should be.
author: Kelly Clarkson

quote: Ten years ago, I still feared loss enough to abandon myself in order to keep things stable. I'd smile when I was sad, pretend to like people who appalled me. What I now know is that losses aren't cataclysmic if they teach the heart and soul their natural cycle of breaking and healing.
author: Martha Beck

quote: You have to really understand that although certain memories or stories make you sad, you are not sad. Pull yourself out from that emotion and remember that.
author: Rupi Kaur

quote: For my wrap present, Colin Farrell gave me a first edition book. I got so involved with this character and I was so sad when the movie was over that when I got home and I tried to read the book I got really emotional and I started crying.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: It is sad to see a woman sacrificing the ties of the affections even to do good.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: The sad reality is that there are no purely domestic issues in Israel. Issues that would be dealt with by municipalities in other countries - such as how to deal with a dangerous bridge or how to resolve conflicts between religious and secular bus riders - become major international issues when they occur in Israel.
author: Alan Dershowitz

quote: You want people to feel something when you tell a story, whether they feel happy or whether they feel sad.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: I am very sad that some designers are still using real fur when the fake alternatives are so effective and so easily obtainable.
author: Twiggy

quote: I went to high school with girls that would daydream about what strip club they wanted to work at. That's one of the sad things about Vegas.
author: Brandon Flowers

quote: I once made the mistake of going for a whole row of false eyelashes, which was just wrong as it gave me a sad, puppy-eyed look.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: When I talk about sad things, I talk about sad things.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: It doesn't help to contemplate how sad your life is. You have to move on.
author: Teri Garr

quote: It would be sad if the expertise built up during the 40 years of the U.S. and Russian manned programmes were allowed to dissipate. But abandoning the shuttle, and committing to new launch vehicles and propulsion systems, is actually a prerequisite for a vibrant manned programme.
author: Martin Rees

quote: The sad truth is that most of my husbands turned out to be convincing liars.
author: Joan Collins

quote: It does make me sad that there's a lot of great songs out there, and they're not going to see the light of day because they're competing with these tailgate songs.
author: Zac Brown

quote: A lot of sad stories in a row - that wears on you.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: 'The Fault in Our Stars' is a beautiful film that's really positive. The second half gets sad, but it's always positive.
author: Ansel Elgort

quote: Having read my share of tell-alls over the year, including some that were passed off as autobiographies, I mostly feel sad - sometimes for the writer and sometimes for all the people in his way. I hope that the process of writing the tell-all gives some release and closure on what clearly was an unpleasant and unfulfilling life experience.
author: Brad Feld

quote: The attacks on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon shook our nation to the core. Americans were deeply frightened, sad, and angry, and they rallied around a President who, at the time, showed impressive certitude and calm.
author: Eliot Spitzer

quote: A sad fact of life lately at the Museum of Modern Art is that when it comes to group shows of contemporary painting from the collection, the bar has been set pretty low.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: I don't think of my songs as sad songs. I think of them as vulnerable and honest. I crack jokes in between songs, so people don't leave feeling too dark.
author: Mary Lambert

quote: Why does the rest of the world put up with the hypocrisy, the need to put a happy face on sorrow, the need to keep on keeping on?... I don't know the answer, I know only that I can't.
author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quote: The day I am not able to fly will be a sad day for me.
author: Ratan Tata

quote: What is sad to me is not what Bill Nye thinks about me. What I found really unfortunate is that after presenting my stand on God's Word, there were a number of Christians who were more complimentary of Bill Nye than of me because Bill Nye was defending evolution and billions of years.
author: Ken Ham

quote: If I don't make it, I'll be very sad that there are things I didn't do, but I'm happy that I've done what I have.
author: Stephen Jay Gould

quote: There are consequences with age, so you have to evolve. I've loved becoming a filmmaker. But I would love to continue modeling, and there isn't really any job for me. It's being marginalized - that's the sad part.
author: Isabella Rossellini

quote: Whenever the lion fish in the fish tank in the captain's ready room died it was always a sad moment.
author: Patrick Stewart

quote: It's important to get well-rounded right off the bat. A lot of experienced dancers can get pigeonholed into one thing. I've been hired for a lot of different gigs simply because I can do a lot of different things with different levels of dancers. And it's sad to me that some dancers don't do more.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: The sad truth is that many behavioral economists know very little about psychology.
author: Richard Thaler

quote: I think that there are a lot of really beautiful Christmas carols, and then sometimes there are horrible renditions of them that are played to death in malls that make me sad. I try to avoid stores where they're playing bad versions of Christmas songs on repeat.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: My mother, I suppose, is still a main figure in my life because her life was so sad and unfair, and she so brave, but also because she was determined to make me into the Sunday-school-recitation little girl I was, from the age of seven or so, fighting not to be.
author: Alice Munro

quote: People just get kicks out of making other people sad.
author: Maisie Williams

quote: Those who gave away their wings are sad not to see them fly.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: I comment on my friends' things; whatever they post, I post funny posts. I don't post anything that's too sad or mad, or at least not for too long. And I'm usually just a happy person! Silly - people would describe me as silly and crazy and fun.
author: GloZell

quote: Homeless people really upset me when I was little. A lot of kids have this reaction, but I would get really worried or sad or concerned or cry.
author: Paul Dano

quote: The sad thing about any business I suppose, but in mine you see it particularly, is that you're always asked to do what you've already done.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: It's sad that children don't spend enough time looking around and being amazed by what's in the real world.
author: Damian Lewis

quote: I'm sad to see the passing of the great drug warriors. I certainly did my part in that battle and I don't regret any of it.
author: Marc Maron

quote: I feel most at home when I'm alone. That's not sad. It's just I feel closest to source and connection when I'm by myself.
author: Tituss Burgess

quote: You mustn't smile when you lose. You have to be sad like other people. You have to win every game.
author: Eden Hazard

quote: I've been on Prozac for 12 years and I'm off it now. I know what it feels like to be excited and sad again. I haven't felt like this in 12 years; I'm like a giddy little kid.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: I wish I could wear 10 dresses to my wedding. It's so sad that you put it in storage and then never see it again. I am going to sleep in mine after I wear it.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: A very sad moment for me was when my parents separated - a lot of crying, 'It's tragic, we're now a broken family, blah blah blah blah blah' - although my psychological problems stopped. I actually felt healthier.
author: Whit Stillman

quote: Sad to say, negative advertising really works.
author: Jerry Della Femina

quote: I've seen a couple white girls coming to my concerts wearing head wraps, and I think they look so cute. It's kind of sad to see that people are really into separation, trying to separate everybody and making a clear division of 'us against you,' even with fashion. That sucks. It's not the way the world is supposed to be.
author: Yuna

quote: I am firmly of the opinion that women who make a lot of effort to hang onto their looks in middle age (unless they are beauties, entertainers or prostitutes) are rather sad, as one should surely have something more substantial to recommend one by this time, such as kindness or cleverness.
author: Julie Burchill

quote: I think a lot about when times were simpler, when I was still dancing and living with my parents. I really miss living at home sometimes. I get really sad.
author: Hailey Baldwin

quote: However, we might oppose it, abortion is a sad feature of modern life.
author: Robert Casey

quote: Of course, you decide which story you want to tell. For me, it's been very authentic, so sometimes I'm super happy, and I post four pictures one after the other; sometimes I'm busy, and I don't. Sometimes I'm sad, and I post a sad picture.
author: Chiara Ferragni

quote: Death makes us sad, but it can also make us feel more alive.
author: Sally Mann

quote: The sad truth for American actors is that they really have no control whatsoever over the material that they get, or can do, particularly actresses. And if you're over 40 and you're an actress, forget it.
author: James Gray

quote: I didn't know my mother had it. I think a lot of women don't know their mothers had it; that's the sad thing about depression. You know, you don't function anymore. You shut down. You feel like you are in a void.
author: Marie Osmond

quote: It's very simple, I just tell my sad story, and people weep.
author: Corazon Aquino

quote: It's sad to see these old buildings go because they have so many memories, and it's a real personal kind of thing when you play these places. It's part of our history just gone.
author: Clarence Clemons

quote: I think women should be seductive, not triste. There's enough sadness in life now without making women look sad, too.
author: Azzedine Alaia

quote: If you're sad about what you see in the mirror when you wake up every morning, you must change it.
author: Azzedine Alaia

quote: I'm sad I'm not in 'The Purge 2.'
author: Lena Headey

quote: You know how sad your life is when you know the release date of DVDs.
author: Heston Blumenthal

quote: I don't mind if what they write about me has some truth in it. Pure imagination makes me feel sad about the whole thing.
author: Shaheer Sheikh

quote: I allow myself to not feel the need to be some sort of wonder woman. You can't do everything at once and tear your hair out when you miss your baby using a potty for the first time, although my son was obviously very sad that his mum was not there on his big day.
author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: For whatever reason, the films I gravitate towards do have these strange sort of tonal balances to them... I kind of realized on '50/ 50' why I liked these blending of tones, because I think it's kind of what life is like: funny one minute, sad the next, scary the next.
author: Jonathan Levine

quote: Indeed, our British friends have decided to leave us - which is very sad for all of us - but life goes on, and the European Union as well goes on.
author: Federica Mogherini

quote: Words are less needful to sorrow than to joy.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: I have nothing against younger women and older men on screen. What is sad is that so many women over 40 who have so much to give aren't being considered to play opposite men their own age or younger.
author: Rene Russo

quote: I think my thing is that... I don't know. And that's why I don't wanna sing about 'This is me, this is who I am' because, like, even the question, 'Tell me about yourself' - what are you supposed to say? 'Ooh, I'm a happy girl, but I'm sad, too'? People are so complex.
author: Zara Larsson

quote: I play sad bastard music. For the money.
author: J. Tillman

quote: New diseases like SARS and bird flu cause anxiety in the community. People get worried, some to the extent that it even affects their health. You feel very sad, and yet you must carry on and maintain your cool in very trying and difficult moments. You have to tough it out.
author: Margaret Chan

quote: Life can be challenging and sad... but music is the easy part.
author: St. Vincent

quote: It makes me sad there is still some intellectual snobbery out there.
author: Steve Easterbrook

quote: When people come and see me, I want them to experience joy. I don't do any sad songs in my show. It's to lift the spirit.
author: Darlene Love

quote: I was always spiritual, even as a child. I was taught to pray, show gratitude. We had an attitude of gratitude. Even if life was ugly, bad or sad - we prayed.
author: Shilpa Shetty

quote: 'The Taxi Ride,' from my second album, is one people want to hear a lot. I'm consciously trying to walk on the sunny side of the street, to really lift myself into a place of greater positivity, and that's a sad song.
author: Jane Siberry

quote: With any group of people in life, sad things happen, and crazy things, and happy things. When you're in the public eye, it's just amplified, that's all.
author: Margot Kidder

quote: It is easy enough to praise men for the courage of their convictions. I wish I could teach the sad young of this mealy generation the courage of their confusions.
author: John Ciardi

quote: From 1997 through 1999, I had gained so much. People don't realize how something like weight gain can make you sad. Losing weight has changed my life. If you can take control of your life, you can lose weight.
author: La India

quote: Next to a lost battle, nothing is so sad as a battle that has been won.
author: Arthur Wellesley

quote: Actually, the moment of victory is wonderful, but also sad. It means that your trip is ended.
author: Bill Toomey

quote: I belong in America more than South Africa. I can't remember the feeling of living there anymore. It's like it was in another life. That's sad in a way. It is my country. It's where I grew up. You don't know what it's like to have these negative feelings about your homeland. There are roots you can't escape.
author: Trevor Rabin

quote: Fortune has played me a sad trick by letting me live on and on.
author: Belle Boyd

quote: If I'm extra happy or excited, it'll take me an hour or two to write a song. Or, if I'm really sad or something, it will take me about a day. But I have a specific way of writing: I just listen to the beat. I think about what I'm going to write over the beat.
author: Astro

quote: The old, sad art colors are gone. Now I paint bright colors. I paint paintings which are happy, where children are laughing and playing with animals. I paint paradise on Earth. I still paint sadness sometimes, but there is sadness in the world, too.
author: Margaret Keane

quote: To be a character who feels a deep emotion, one must go into the memory's vault and mix in a sad memory from one's own life.
author: Albert Finney

quote: And it's sad because it's like a surprise to people - almost an anomaly - when artists are actually refined and trained on an instrument. That's the last thing people think about.
author: Vanessa Carlton

quote: If I was sad or afraid, I would sit in a corner and sing. If I was happy I would jump into the middle of the room and sing. It was how I expressed my emotions.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: Teaching is a truly noble profession. It's sad the amount of responsibility that teachers have today. They're not only teaching kids: they're raising kids, policing kids - and they don't make a lot of money.
author: Jesse L. Martin

quote: I love playing football, being out on the pitch with a ball, and I will be a little sad when that ends.
author: Dennis Bergkamp

quote: There is something inexpressibly sad in the thought of the children who crossed the ocean with the Pilgrims and the fathers of Jamestown, New Amsterdam, and Boston, and the infancy of those born in the first years of colonial life in this strange new world.
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote: I think the intellectual consistency of Christianity in historical evidence is frankly overwhelming, but my materialist colleagues regard me as a slightly sad case.
author: Simon Conway Morris

quote: Well, you can't be depressed and sad 24 hours a day.
author: Julia Sweeney

quote: Our generation, unfortunately, is stuck to our phones - and, like, Twitter - constantly, which I have no problem with. I'd say we're not describing the children of America or anything like that, but there is something to take from it: It is kind of sad how we can't go thirty minutes without checking our phone.
author: Israel Broussard

quote: Scientology is probably one of the most misunderstood things, and it's sad that it's so misunderstood.
author: Stanley Clarke

quote: I wrote a techno song after I was deported. I was in America for a little bit, but then I was deported back to Germany. I was very sad.
author: Flula Borg

quote: The pro athlete is a sad tale. He signs a big contract and thinks he's set for life. I didn't think I was set for life, and I don't now. As athletes, we are important, celebrities, in demand and rich. Then we are out of the game and we are not important, not celebrities, not in demand and not rich.
author: Fran Tarkenton

quote: My childhood, I would say, was a bit sad.
author: Columba Bush

quote: The '80s were fabulous. The '90s sucked, and the '70s were just a sad, sad time in human history. Go 1980s! There's something that's just so cute about that time. And not just yellow nail polish and 'I'm a loner.'
author: Jennifer Sky

quote: I'd love to have a room full of taxidermy. I'd be devastated if my cat, Archimedes, ever died. I was debating the other day with a friend whether I should stuff him, but don't know whether he would end up looking like himself. I'd be really sad if he looked strange.
author: Tuppence Middleton

quote: Taste is one of the five senses, and the man who tells us with priggish pride that he does not care what he eats is merely boasting of his sad deficiency: he might as well be proud of being deaf or blind, or, owing to a perpetual cold in the head, of being devoid of the sense of smell.
author: E. F. Benson

quote: When sparrows build and the leaves break forth, My old sorrow wakes and cries.
author: Jean Ingelow

quote: I don't wanta do any Blues or any sad songs.
author: Bob Livingston

quote: Sometimes you feel sad to be left out of a big debate.
author: John King

quote: It always made me sad that there were kids who didn't have homes.
author: Lauren Holly

quote: I hooked up with director Jacques Audiard for this film called 'Rust & Bone' with Marion Cotillard. I loved that experience so much I'm truly sad that it's over!
author: Matthias Schoenaerts

quote: My acting's very understated. I think my sad and happy don't play that differently onscreen.
author: Bret McKenzie

quote: I was sad to leave 'Downton,' but I will always remember it fondly, as they did me a lot of favours. I owe them a lot.
author: Thomas Howes

quote: From inside where I live, I feel like I just perceive events in a certain rational way. I often find it sad or poignant, and it may not make me laugh a bit. But I don't mind inventing a portrait that allows others to laugh if that's what they want to do.
author: Madeline Kahn

quote: Once I was checking to hotel and a couple saw my ring with Blues on it. They said, 'You play blues. That music is so sad.' I gave them tickets to the show, and they came up afterwards and said, 'You didn't play one sad song.'
author: Buddy Guy

quote: I like to express certain things that happen in my life, the joy of spring, the birds singing and young babies coming into the world. You know, the whole thing as well as the part I'm not happy with, the sad part.
author: Roy Haynes

quote: The poem is sad because it wants to be yours, and cannot be.
author: John Ashbery

quote: My parents were mourning the death of my sister. She was killed in a car accident before I was born, and I didn't know she existed until I was 13 or 14 years old. I knew I was growing up in a house where people were angry and sad.
author: Andrew Hudgins

quote: I love dancing to the radio every morning, to start the day with such passion. Otherwise, life is too sad. My little daughter and I like dancing to classical music: Bach and Schubert.
author: Anna Mouglalis

quote: All you'd have to do is get a sad look, and he'd try to do something for you.
author: Margaret O'Brien

quote: We all had lots of stories of our sad experiences - they mourned the death of my wife with me - but we were hopeful that the children would return.
author: Otto Frank

quote: It's a sad commentary on where politics is today. If someone disagrees with you, you're either Attila the Hun or a leftist liberal.
author: James R. Leininger

quote: He is a hard man who is only just, and a sad one who is only wise.
author: Voltaire

quote: War is very sad and small life is pathetically fragile at times.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: The history of apartheid-era South Africa is incredibly sad and at times infuriatingly incomprehensible.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: August used to be a sad month for me. As the days went on, the thought of school starting weighed heavily upon my young frame. That, coupled with the oppressive heat and humidity of my native Washington, D.C., only seemed to heighten the misery.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: My style is bad white-boy dancing. I can do swing a little bit, but nothing beyond that. My solo dancing is sad. I use my arms, badly.
author: Robin Williams

quote: The display of grief makes more demands than grief itself. How few men are sad in their own company.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Creation is a sustained period of bliss, even though the subject can still be very sad. Because there's the triumph of coming through and understanding that you have, and that you did it the way only you could do it. You didn't do it the way somebody told you to do it.
author: Alice Walker

quote: We have but one permanent home: heaven - that's still the old truth that we always have to re-learn - and it's only through the impact of sad experiences that we assimilate it.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: The assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr. made me very, very sad, and I mourned and I cried like many of our citizens did.
author: John Lewis

quote: The problem, when comparing contemporary television to television in 1974, is that TV has become not just bad but sad.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: My father was an urchin that lived in Hell's Kitchen. He was part of a family of nine. I mean, there were times that were better and worse, but mostly, by the time we got to L.A., they'd lost whatever they had. And it was a sad time. And both he and I became truck drivers for different companies.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: Most organizations don't fall apart as a result of one big blow. Most relationships don't end because of one grand argument. Most lives don't fall to pieces due to one sad event. No, I suggest to you that sustained failure happens as the consequence of small, daily acts of neglect that stack up over time to lead to a blow up - and break down.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: So many amongst us live in the past rather than loving the present and building a brilliant future. Some people stay stuck for years over something they did or a failure they've experienced. Sad. A life is a terrible thing to waste.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: When I was a young girl, I lost a lot of weight over one summer - involuntarily - and was just really depressed and sad. There was nothing I could do to gain weight. I would look in the mirror and call myself disgusting every day.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: I loved being Maleficent. I was quite sad to put my staff down and put my horns away because somehow, she just lives in a different world.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: She would have thrived as a grandmother. I know how much she would have contributed to their lives, and I am sad they will miss out on that.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: That is sad until one recalls how many bad books the world may yet be spared because of the busyness of writers.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: I can't really have any friends. It's sad, really. It's lonely. But that's how I am.
author: Randy Moss

quote: I certainly feel sad about the alienation from my son.
author: Harold Pinter

quote: It's so sad, actually, how teachers and parents tell their kids, 'You're never gonna be anything.'
author: Solange Knowles

quote: Usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. They just cry over their condition. But when they get angry, they bring about a change.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: I was very sad to hear of the death of Ronnie Barker, who was such a warm, friendly and encouraging presence to have when I started in television. He was also a great comic actor to learn from.
author: John Cleese

quote: You know, why at the end of your life should you assemble thousands of pages of 'Why am I so sad, why am I so depressed?' Instead, assemble thousands of pages of why you're so content.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: The best quality about Kobe Bryant? You want me to be honest? I don't know. I'll tell you why. I open my arms to everybody. But he never stepped forward for the embrace. So I never really got to know him. I don't know anything about him, and it's kinda sad.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: We're sad about some of the losses of members of great seniority and distinction in the Congress, and some very new members, who will no longer be serving with us.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: My parents' divorce left me with a lot of sadness and pain and acting, and especially humour, was my way of dealing with all that.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: It's sad, something coming to an end. It cracks you open, in a way - cracks you open to feeling.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: I was such a sullen, angry, sad kid. I'm sure there are writers who have had happy childhoods, but what are you going to write about? No ghosts, no fear. I'm very happy that I had an unhappy and uncomfortable childhood.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Poetry is a beautiful way of expressing feelings - happy, sad, angry, caring. It's also a way that we share with other people, to help them with those feelings.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: I'm sad to see celluloid go, there's no doubt. But, you know, nitrate went, by the way, in 1971. If you ever saw a nitrate print of a silent film and then saw an acetate print, you'd see a big difference, but nobody remembers anymore. The acetate print is what we have. Maybe. Now it's digital.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: To the indefinite, uncertain mind of the American radical the most contradictory ideas and methods are possible. The result is a sad chaos in the radical movement, a sort of intellectual hash, which has neither taste nor character.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: When DVDs finally disappear, I'm going to be sad. I'll miss the commentaries.
author: Matt Groening

quote: The sad fact is that it would be fair to say that United is a generic, bureaucratic, tired company. A sort of DMV in the sky. No real culture. No real strategy. No real expectations for employees or customers. All of which is a shame.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: I would love to be married. But it's not a necessity like the way that I feel I need and want to have children. It would be wonderful to have a husband, and I would feel blessed to do it. But I would feel sad for the rest of my life if I had no kids.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I was a very sad little girl.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: I basically live out of my truck - I mean from place to place. I feel more at home in my truck than just about anywhere, which is a sad thing to say, but it's true.
author: Sam Shepard

quote: Life is never all one thing. It bounces around. Certainly, my own life has. Look at Woody Allen's funny movies - all the humor comes out of sad stuff. Sometimes you have to laugh, no matter what life deals you.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: There were points in my life where I felt oddly irresistible to women. I'm not in that state now and that makes me sad.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: When I did the film Generations, in which the character died, I felt like a guest for the first time. That made me very sad.
author: William Shatner

quote: I love books; my suitcases are always full of them. Books and shoes. I read when I am sad, when I am happy, when I am nervous. My favourite British author is Jane Austen, and my favourite American one is John O'Hara.
author: Carolina Herrera

quote: I don't have any problem with being the guy whose album people put on when they're feeling sad.
author: Sam Smith

quote: It's a source of great sadness to me that my father died without having seen me do anything worthwhile. He was constantly having to make excuses for me.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: The rise of the iPod meant that digital music became the norm, It's sad, but you can still find the real stuff out there if you look for it!
author: Peter Hook

quote: We've got people looking at our seamy side and our sad side a lot of the time because that's easier. It's much more difficult to make a film about happiness with lots of jokes in it.
author: Emma Thompson

quote: Nobody wants to hear R&B. It's sad. If you want to be on the radio you got to stay young.
author: Jamie Foxx

quote: Among the many reasons assignable for the sad decay of true Christianity, perhaps the neglecting to assemble ourselves together, in religious societies, may not be one of the least.
author: George Whitefield

quote: I'll always be sad that my marriage ended.
author: Shania Twain

quote: The Indian Summer of life should be a little sunny and a little sad, like the season, and infinite in wealth and depth of tone, but never hustled.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Whenever I start a new book, I think, 'This is the most interesting subject of all time. It's sad, I'll never enjoy writing another book as much as I enjoy this one.' Every time, I'm convinced. And then I change my mind when I start the next book.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I don't know who would not classify themselves as a romantic. I think that would be sort of sad.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: Humor comes in all forms, and everyone has their cup of tea about what makes them laugh. But the day we censor humor is a sad one for sure.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: What we want to help children with is, just because you feel sad or happy or depressed doesn't mean that is who you are. We want them to know, 'I am really sad right now, but I am not a sad person.'
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: The history of soccer is a sad voyage from beauty to duty. When the sport became an industry, the beauty that blossoms from the joy of play got torn out by its very roots.
author: Eduardo Galeano

quote: My lasting impression of Truman Capote is that he was a terribly gentle, terribly sensitive, and terribly sad man.
author: Alvin Ailey

quote: I know that there is a great diversity of opinion as to who, in fact, pays the duties on imports. I do not intend to discuss that point. We of the staple and exporting States have long settled the question for ourselves, almost unanimously, from sad experience.
author: John C. Calhoun

quote: I so desperately hate to end these movies that the first thing I do when I'm done is write another one. Then I don't feel sad about having to leave and everybody going away. That's why I tend to work with the same people; I really befriend them.
author: John Hughes

quote: Cancer is a very sad thing, but you can always take something from every experience.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I'm, like, the only actor in New York who's never, ever been on any 'Law & Order.' And I've auditioned for so many. The sad thing is I love 'Law & Order.' I'm really obsessed with it. And they always said to me, 'You seem like you're making fun of the material.'
author: Greta Gerwig

quote: Ninety percent of people who lose weight gain it back. It's very sad.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: I'm sad to report that in the past few years, ever since uncertainty became our insistent 21st century companion, leadership has taken a great leap backwards to the familiar territory of command and control.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: The hardest thing to get is true emotion. I always believe you need to earn that with the audience. You can't just tell them, 'Ok, be sad now.'
author: John Lasseter

quote: I survived turning 60, I was not thrilled to turn 61, I was less thrilled to turn 62, I didn't much like being 63, I loathed being 64, and I will hate being 65. I don't let on about such things in person; in person, I am cheerful and Pollyanna-ish. But the honest truth is that it's sad to be over 60.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: I'm incredibly sad that my mother's not here to see my kids and that my kids don't get to know her. And she didn't meet my husband. That's one of the hardest things. I don't even know how to put that into words.
author: Stella McCartney

quote: Fashion really is women's liberation in a lot of ways. Look at how many women in this country are depressed about how they look and how they think they have to look! It's really sad. And it's not about money.
author: Iris Apfel

quote: It sounds so nerdy and pathetic, but what I always do on Sunday afternoon is bring my inbox down to zero, which is so sad. But e-mail has become like homework for adults. I'll have 141 messages from people who will be offended if I don't write back.
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: Well, you know, too much democracy is a sort of sad thing.
author: Ann Richards

quote: It makes one sad to see the sell-out of President Fox; really, it makes one sad. How sad that the president of a people like the Mexicans lets himself become the puppy dog of the empire.
author: Hugo Chavez

quote: I will be very sad and worried if the imperialist government was calling me a great democratic man.
author: Hugo Chavez

quote: I'm not sad at all about turning 40.
author: Halle Berry

quote: My greatest regret is not having gone to Wellesley College. it is something I have felt a little sad about my whole life.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: I had a daughter and lost her a long while ago. That's too sad a story to go into.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: I know a lot of sad people who aren't comedians.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: I am an optimist, unrepentant and militant. After all, in order not to be a fool an optimist must know how sad a place the world can be. It is only the pessimist who finds this out anew every day.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: I was in a bar and I said to a friend, 'You know, we've become those 40-year-old guys we used to look at and say, 'Isn't it sad?'
author: George Clooney

quote: I love curves; I'm all about curves. I don't have many, which is really sad, but I think the more the better.
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: There is something sad about malevolence, to be wicked. I have always tried to make that come across in the villains I have played.
author: Christopher Lee

quote: Watching an entrepreneur fail is sad, but watching him fail from lack of nerve is tragic.
author: Steve Blank

quote: I think everything is going to be devastatingly sad - when the phone rings, I know somebody in my family's been hurt, somebody's going to die. I'm sure a therapist would go, 'That's not a good way to live,' but every time it's not that bad thing, I'm so thankful and appreciative.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: It's sad when you say a $30 million film is an inexpensive film, but it is.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: It's sad that grandkids show up at the end of obituaries, way behind the list of work place achievements, social clubs and survivors. Why last? If you've got grandkids, you know they're first when it comes to the joy in your life.
author: Regina Brett

quote: I believe that tracks speak to me. Some tracks make me write certain music or make me feel sad or inspire me to write a sad love song. Each track has its feeling to me.
author: Missy Elliott

quote: When I seemed to be irritable or sad, my father would quote the learned Dr. Knight, and then say, 'Just go to sleep.' Like all smart aleck kids, I thought the advice was silly. But as I've grown older, I've realized just how smart Knight was.
author: Ben Stein

quote: I remember a time when all my fans were crying and sad and going through hell. Now, we're trying to uplift each other and accept ourselves for who we are, even if nobody else does.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: I just want fans to walk away knowing that no matter what's going on, no matter how happy you are, no matter how sad you are, we did it. We're strong in this. We've come a long way, and life is not just one thing.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: This is a sick business. It's so sad.
author: Sia

quote: It's really a sad story, and I liked that. The songs on this album talk about relationships in every aspect.
author: Aaliyah

quote: It's sad how people want to see us females go against each other. Never been for that. Never will.
author: Ciara

quote: I think it's a time to be sad about what's been done to the United States Senate, the greatest deliberative body in the world.
author: Mitch McConnell

quote: It's a sad state when more people retweet than buy records.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: The whole 1950s notion was find the right girl, get married, move to the suburbs and then hang out with the guys while she stayed home with the babies. I felt that was sort of sad.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: If it was up to me, I would just wear jeans and t-shirts, even to red carpets, but then no one would photograph me, so that would make me very sad. So you know, I've gotta keep up with the rest of the female population and sometimes try a little harder.
author: Shakira

quote: I feel like old age in America is a very sad thing. I have been many different places around the world where getting older is something you look forward to.
author: Alice Waters

quote: It's actually sad to be rich.
author: Masayoshi Son

quote: I think I would be very sad if I wasn't able to have a baby.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: It is a sad day for our country when the moral foundation of our law and the acknowledgment of God has to be hidden from public view to appease a federal judge.
author: Soledad O'Brien

quote: The first series I wrote, 'L.A. Candy,' was always meant to be a three-book series, so when I started out it was all outlined that way and by the time I was done with the third book, I had become so involved and the process and the stories, I was a little bit sad to be done.
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: I am co-writing a screenplay now and I'm working on the rights to another story I want to do. So I plan to produce and direct. So, for me, I don't really feel that I am vulnerable to that sad baggage that comes with the business of filmmaking.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: It's a sad situation when you have to talk crap about other organizations that you know your paths are never going to cross competitively.
author: Bill Goldberg

quote: The sad fact is that actual artistic oppression - book banning in its many modern forms - is a matter of course in the entertainment industry, especially when the underlying product is declared politically incorrect or runs contrary to the interests of Hollywood's political altar, the Democratic Party.
author: Andrew Breitbart

quote: Metal isn't necessarily aggressive. There's metal that's contemplative, there's metal that's sad, and there's metal that's exuberant. No genre is limited in what it can express.
author: John Darnielle

quote: I can cook, but I also want everything to look beautiful on the plate - then I get upset when people eat it. Everyone just tears through it, and that makes me sad. It's not a rewarding experience for me to cook.
author: Megan Fox

quote: It was always kind of sad when your favorite punk rockers, like Jello Biafra or someone, would say they hate something you like. It was, 'Oh, I thought we were on the same page.'
author: Richard Linklater

quote: Funny and sad are two sides of the same coin. I think that most comedians are able to tap into deep subject matter.
author: Hasan Minhaj

quote: I guess I was an early method actress. I would go to a quiet part of the sound stage with my mother. I wouldn't think of anything sad, I would just make my mind a blank. In a minute I could cry.
author: Shirley Temple

quote: I feel sad when I realize how much truth is being changed or obscured in the American media.
author: Sharon Stone

quote: Most performers are used to the highs and the lows. If you can let a low stop you, that would be a sad commentary.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: I see tech as... a force that is changing pretty much all parts of our society. It's really sad for me that we don't have enough women that are part of that.
author: Susan Wojcicki

quote: I'm a human being. I feel all emotions. I'm not just happy all the time. Sometimes, I'm sad and feel the blues. Sometimes I even want to feel the blues. Sometimes, you want to feel down.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: You know, the sad thing of post-9/11, which was of course horrific, was that the city in which I felt completely at home for two decades, suddenly people like us - brown people - were looked at as the 'Others.'
author: Mira Nair

quote: I'm more apt to cry at something beautiful than at something sad.
author: Teller

quote: As a child, I was subjected to a lot of spaghetti Westerns and hated them. I wanted the Indians to win - or just not be so sad!
author: Kara Walker

quote: If I get the forty additional years statisticians say are likely coming to me, I could fit in at least one, maybe two new lifetimes. Sad that only one of those lifetimes can include being the mother of young children.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: I was the class podiatrist. I never made it to class clown. I wasn't funny enough. I would examine feet and prescribe and ointment. It was a sad childhood.
author: Gilbert Gottfried

quote: I'm so pathetically eager for people to love D.C. It's so sad. It's like I work for the chamber of commerce or something.
author: Tucker Carlson

quote: I was sad that Corpse Bride was so short. I would've liked to have had her around for way longer. She doesn't actually have that many scenes.
author: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: The British people have decided to leave. It is a sad decision but one which I respect. The vote puts the European Union in difficulties. It must recognise its shortfalls.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: Being on your own would be sad, sick and weird. I don't trust myself. I need that balance.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I've got to be high class... Which is sad, because I like bars.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I love music videos, I really do. I think it's kind of sad that it's a dying art form.
author: Adam Levine

quote: I didn't know what to expect when we first started touring behind 'Southeastern' because you don't want to lull anybody to sleep or lose their attention. But it's really been incredible how the crowds seem to be just as excited for the slow, sad songs as they are for the old rockers.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: If I could write rock & roll songs on purpose, I'd do it all the time. But most of what I write comes out slow and sad because that's most of what I listen to.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: When I hear somebody like Hayes Carll write a song that's touching and poignant and sad and funny all at the same time, it motivates me to step my game up and try to figure out a way to get more different emotions into one line or one song.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: My mother and father were very strange people. They tried to be funny which is always very sad to me.
author: Jonathan Winters

quote: I get really sad when people say, 'I'm no good. I haven't been cast in a pilot.' It doesn't mean you're not good; it just means someone hasn't seen you yet. It doesn't mean that in real life you're not the greatest actor.
author: Matthew Gray Gubler

quote: I've always been such a loser with my organisation skills. That has always been one of my sad stand-out points.
author: Ella Woodward

quote: I was singing the blues when I was six. Kind of sad, eh?
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: I've always been very supported. I've never really been sad. I've just been broke. They are very different things.
author: Daveed Diggs

quote: It's sad that people will invade someone's privacy - and this is not only regarding someone's private photos - but this goes deep into people's financial privacy, their passwords, their emails, their text messages.
author: Yvonne Strahovski

quote: I'm not a singer. In 'Bye Bye Birdie,' I think I was the sad girl who sits on the park bench during 'Put on a Happy Face.'
author: Yvonne Strahovski

quote: I think Jerry Lee is sad. As a musician, he was far more talented than Elvis Presley. Everybody down in Memphis knows that. Elvis became a movie star because he was beautiful. Not that Elvis wasn't talented, but Jerry Lee Lewis was incomprehensibly talented as a musician.
author: Alec Baldwin

quote: It's very rare that things are true about yourself that are on the Internet. It's just sad sometimes. So you definitely try and stay away from it as much as possible.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: I do say all I've ever written about is being alone. And most people take that as, 'Oh, that's so sad.' And I always say, 'No. No, all I ever write about is being alone, and sometimes that's a beautiful, beautiful thing.'
author: Shonda Rhimes

quote: E! has just become a sad, sad place to live. They don't know what they're doing; they have no ideas... everything they do just is a failure.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: 'The Killing' has a really great combination of qualities: Even though it's very sad and deals with mourning and grief, it's still exciting. It's about real people and it doesn't shy from the painful points of life.
author: Joel Kinnaman

quote: I'm convinced I got signed because of who I am. And it makes me sad.
author: Jeff Buckley

quote: Certain emotions just take you to the notes - being furious, heroic, sad, erotic, when rain comes.
author: Jeff Buckley

quote: I'm convinced part of the reason I got signed is because of who I am, and it makes me sad.
author: Jeff Buckley

quote: Nixon has enough to overcome in terms of his legacy and his political history. Now he has to overcome the in-fighting between his daughters. It's so sad. There's another obstacle for him to clear.
author: Monica Crowley

quote: I think the thing's that perhaps sad really is that younger people haven't come in and I think it must have been absolutely fantastic to have worked in the 50's when you had all of the great Broadway composers and when West Side Story didn't win the Tony Award.
author: Andrew Lloyd Webber

quote: Everyone feels sad occasionally. A full range of emotions is part of what makes us human.
author: Michael Greger

quote: Sad music, I always thought, is more beautiful than other music. But at the same time, I am in my personal life a very happy guy. I have a sense of humor. I am not the kind of depressed guy all the time brooding. No. I am very enthusiastic about things.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: Your joys and sorrows. You can never tell them. You cheapen the inside of yourself if you do tell them.
author: Greta Garbo

quote: Western governments have generally tried to contain genocide by appeasing its architects. But the sad record of the last century shows that the walls the United States tries to build around genocidal societies almost inevitably shatter.
author: Samantha Power

quote: I was told so many times when I was a kid, 'I can't be friends with you, you're too intense, you're too sad all the time.' I really thought that when I made the first album that everyone would understand me, all the people who weren't my friends would become my friends.
author: Fiona Apple

quote: For me, it is sad when I listen to this, that one player must be more selfish to reach the top level.
author: Antonio Conte

quote: Los Angeles can be a really sad city.
author: Adam Lambert

quote: Don't eat because you're angry, bored, sad, or stressed.
author: John Rampton

quote: Frankly, I think I'm marvelous in rehearsal! Then you turn the camera on, and it gets stiff and tight. And then you trudge back to your trailer feeling sad. That's been my experience of film acting.
author: Hugh Grant

quote: I know I said I wanted to live forever and I would never be bored, but the reality is, it's probably kind of sad to live forever if you're the only one sticking around.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: I still really like newspapers. I'm gonna feel really sad when they go. Or not - maybe I'll be dead.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: So few people read poetry. That's sad, isn't it?
author: Jerry Hall

quote: You get people who come to London, sever links with where they come from, and then when they need people, there's nobody there. To feel like you can't go back home would be a horribly sad place to be, as is mistaking fame for genuine love and affection.
author: Johnny Vegas

quote: If I write a sad song, at the end it's gotta be like, 'Dude, things are looking up!'
author: Andy Grammer

quote: I don't know what to say to that, but I have to agree with Johnny that, yeah, we do touch upon things that most men would rather not admit: That we feel pain, we cry, get sad and sometimes don't deal well with disappointment.
author: Peter Steele

quote: It makes me very sad. Everyone's afraid of each other - Jews are afraid of Palestinians, Palestinians are afraid of Jews. Everywhere I see fear, not understanding. Reason went out of the window a long time ago.
author: Miriam Margolyes

quote: It would be a sad day if we British stopped being cynical, but you sometimes wonder whether we overdo it.
author: Boris Johnson

quote: I don't want to see myself as this sad, disabled girl. I know that. I don't want other people to see me as that, either.
author: Amy Purdy

quote: Stories have always been the things that entertain me and make me feel happy and sad and move me and give me the experience of being able to live many lives in one lifetime. It's the best thing about being alive.
author: Michael Sheen

quote: For a culture that has such a problem with death, we seem to deal with it in a quite bizarre way. We see people shot, killed and blown up, and we find it funny and sexy and all those things. But, the reality of it is that every day people die, and people are really sad and they grieve and they go through a really difficult process with it.
author: Michael Sheen

quote: The worst thing I've done while sad is sit in defeat. That's very unhealthy. The best thing to do is dust yourself off and try again.
author: Winnie Harlow

quote: About 15,000 years ago, humans colonised America, wiping out in the process about 75% of its large mammals. Numerous other species disappeared from Africa, from Eurasia, and from the myriad islands around their coasts. The archaeological record of country after country tells the same sad story.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: One of the sad things about retiring is that you just become increasingly irrelevant. The world flows around you, and you don't seem to be impacting it any longer.
author: John Mackey

quote: Everybody likes Johnny Cash. I think the sad part of it is his health is givin' him problems.
author: Merle Haggard

quote: Saturdays and Sundays, America in the year 2009 does not in some ways differ significantly from the country that existed almost 50 years ago. This is truly sad.
author: Eric Holder

quote: It's a sad indication of where Washington has come, where policy differences almost necessarily become questions of integrity. I came to Washington in the late '70s, and people had the ability in the past to have intense policy differences but didn't feel the need to question the other person's character.
author: Eric Holder

quote: It's a sad commentary when I have to say that sometimes in our country we are real sensitive to race.
author: Oscar Robertson

quote: I find it amusing on one level, poignant on another, when people try to get recognition from an outside source. It's sad.
author: Grace Slick

quote: Scientists habitually moan that the public doesn't understand them. But they complain too much: public ignorance isn't peculiar to science. It's sad if some citizens can't tell a proton from a protein. But it's equally sad if they're ignorant of their nation's history, can't speak a second language, or can't find Venezuela or Syria on a map.
author: Martin Rees

quote: My dad was a homicide cop in the gay neighborhood in the city when gay neighborhoods were desperate, depressing, sad places run by the mob. The only gay people he'd met when I came out to him were corpses.
author: Dan Savage

quote: Of course it's true: the public want to see young people - young people are the people who go to the cinema. It's a sad fact of life, but you've got to accept it and not whine about it.
author: Joan Collins

quote: You're playing a role, but you're still feeling it. You can walk away from it after 'Cut,' but if you're playing a sad or mixed-up person, it's hard to stay in that place for these longish period of times. You kind of have to check out.
author: Nick Nolte

quote: I always thought it was sad that you couldn't get anything really good to eat at concerts, so we sit down with our fans before every show and eat a gourmet meal that we made for them.
author: Zac Brown

quote: I feel quite sad for the young musicians coming up because they may never get to pay their rent properly. It doesn't matter what the genre; nowadays, it's so much harder than it ever was.
author: Bryan Adams

quote: Fear of carbs, of gluten, of everything - we've distanced ourselves from the beauty of food, the art of it. It makes me sad when people say, 'Oh, I don't eat gluten. I don't eat cheese. I don't eat this. So I eat cardboard.'
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: When I moved out of my mom's house at 18 I was almost as sad to leave her sewing machine behind as anything else.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: My thing with fans is, it's always about being really good to them and taking the time to take every picture. If there are 300 people, you should take 300 pictures - you shouldn't take 250 because then fifty people will go home sad. Why would you do that?
author: Ansel Elgort

quote: I agree with cosmetic surgery for medical reasons - my mother had breast cancer and I think it's very sad when somebody has no choice in what happens to their body.
author: Paloma Faith

quote: I remembered myself as an unpopular and rather sad kid.
author: Sydney Pollack

quote: Chocolate is the go-to ingredient for many people. It is the thing people crave when they are happy and celebrate; it is also the go-to ingredient for many people when we are sad or depressed. It makes us feel better.
author: Johnny Iuzzini

quote: The sad pattern of lack of trust in God has persisted since the Creation.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: I've had some pretty good arguments with people, but I've never regretted it. I've had people come up where it's all emotion and no fact. That's always sad.
author: Patton Oswalt

quote: I think as an American society, when we're paying too many taxes or dealing with war, we don't want to see sad things at the movies.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: I'd like a male to listen to my music and find it kind of fascinating, what a girl goes through when they get heartbroken or get sad or get hurt by something.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: Even when I'm in quite a happy state of mind, I like writing really sad songs. I think a lot of people do.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: You get used to sadness, growing up in the mountains, I guess.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: What makes old age so sad is not that our joys but our hopes cease.
author: Jean Paul

quote: What I am sad about is that there is now, in America, no equivalent to the art circuit.
author: Richard Attenborough

quote: I'm very artistic and creative, disorganised - ambitious, I would say, if that even makes sense. I'm definitely not the most mathematical person in the world; not scientific. I can't even work out a tip; it's really sad. But I've always thought, play up your strengths and let someone else handle your weaknesses. It's OK. Work together.
author: Whitney Wolfe

quote: I can usually tell when a woman is going through a divorce because they look so gaunt and tired and sad. It's just a huge sadness. It's horrible. It's like death. You mourn, but the person's still there.
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: For me, it's sad to say, but I would probably have a spiritual marriage but not a legal marriage, because I think so much about marriage starts to become about finances. It has nothing to do with God or feelings or the romantic side of marriage. It's about who owns what, who gets what? So what's the point?
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: I started balding at age 17 and after first being sad, I really embraced it.
author: Jason Alexander

quote: I get kind of sad when I look at all of my magazines and think about how at one time I was much more impressed with a certain fashion editorial, or how I feel like I can't really relate to being that excited about fashion anymore. Maybe it's being jaded, but I honestly like that now, when something's really good, I feel more affected by it.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: When I was starting out, I saw it as something that was definitely going to end. Every time I came to New York for fashion week or to interview someone, I was so sad going back home because I thought, 'These things don't get to last.' That's sort of the narrative of young success.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: I think that when you make yourself vulnerable, the thing that you do next is better. It's not like you have to inflict pain on yourself in order to make yourself better, but I think it helps. The thing that bonds you to a new friend isn't that you went to a really fun party; it's 'cause you had a really weird, sad conversation.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: For me, fashion is something that makes you feel alive, that expresses something of you: if you are sad, if you are happy.
author: Alessandro Michele

quote: I never want to go out wearing something sad.
author: Alessandro Michele

quote: I like to be able to feel as many parts of myself while watching a movie at one time. I think that's what 'Super' is - it's funny, but it's also sad. It's very touching in certain ways, and it's also got a very dark sense of humor. So it's allowed to go anywhere.
author: James Gunn

quote: Women often postpone their lives, thinking that if they're not with a partner then it doesn't really count. They're still searching for their prince, in a way. And as much as we don't discuss that, because it's too embarrassing and too sad, I think it really does exist.
author: Jane Campion

quote: The day I quit, I want people to be sad about it.
author: Gianluigi Buffon

quote: I get to play characters that kind of shock people and I enjoy doing that. I like characters that have meaning and get people in the heart. I want to be able to get people to cry or make people angry or sad.
author: Alexa Vega

quote: What's really sad is that a lot of very talented people are being forced to do things that are very embarrassing and I don't intend to be one of them.
author: Boy George

quote: When I see people wasting their hours doing nothing productive, nothing to contribute to the world, nothing to build relationships, it makes me sad. Actually, it makes me mad. I want to scream, 'Wake up!'.
author: Delilah

quote: Like many of my friends in the Pakistani diaspora - and many of my friends in Pakistan itself, for that matter - I have sometimes looked at the country of my birth and wondered whether its future will be one of steady and sad decline.
author: Mohsin Hamid

quote: I'm not Meryl Streep. My God - she's the greatest actor that ever lived. It's sad that ordinary actors like me are compared to her.
author: Sissy Spacek

quote: 'Lord of the Rings' was my jam. I was so depressed when I realized that I couldn't live in Middle-earth. And I was so sad when I was eleven and didn't get a letter from Hogwarts saying that I was going to be a wizard!
author: Lucas Till

quote: This Olympics is almost a little sad. It is my final Olympics. There are a lot of good memories.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: I love 'The Sportswriter' by Richard Ford. Ford really captures for me the bittersweetness of the quietly suffering American man. It's stoic, sad, and really beautiful.
author: Mark Ruffalo

quote: I didn't end up some sad, tragic guy singing in a lounge somewhere. I never went out and took big money for nostalgia and became like an oldies act.
author: David Cassidy

quote: I think it is really sad that when people lose their homes they kind of lose their minds too.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: I'm so grounded, it's sad.
author: Patti LaBelle

quote: The sad thing is that I feel so boring because 'Twilight' is literally how every conversation I have these days begins - whether it's someone I'm meeting for the first time or someone I just haven't seen in a while. The first thing I want to say to them is, 'It's insane! And, as a person, I can't do anything!'
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: I used to like to make myself sad, so I would listen to Bill Callahan as Smog.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: 'Dancing on My Own' is actually a really sad song! It has totally made me cry.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: I think that's very sad, that I haven't allowed my heart to be broken. I have broken a few.
author: Sally Field

quote: I got interested in reading very early, because a story was read to me, by Hans Christian Andersen, which was 'The Little Mermaid,' and I don't know if you remember 'The Little Mermaid,' but it's dreadfully sad. The little mermaid falls in love with this prince, but she cannot marry him because she is a mermaid.
author: Alice Munro

quote: At that time, I feel sad, and I feel no one knows how hard I work and how many tears. They only know the score. At that time, I feel very lonely because no one understands since they haven't been world No. 1 before.
author: Yani Tseng

quote: Not even the creators of 'Rock Band' could possibly believe that playing the game is tantamount to making your own music. There is, however, a sad similarity between 'Rock Band' and some actual bands, and that is the attempt at realness.
author: Carrie Brownstein

quote: For those aspiring to make a living from travel photography, it's a sad fact that the boring shots are the shots that are going to make you money.
author: Martin Parr

quote: I meditate an hour in the morning and an hour in the evening. Once a year I go away for a long retreat. And overall, I just feel more comfortable in my own skin and less anxious, less sad, less fearful.
author: Rivers Cuomo

quote: It's awkward to tell others that your spouse has died. Everyone becomes so sad and sorry, and you just hate like heck to have to break the news to someone who hasn't heard the news.
author: Mike Gallagher

quote: We tell our triumphs to the crowds, but our own hearts are the sole confidants of our sorrows.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I actually get quite sad when I smell bacon.
author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quote: You've got to be happy when you play a sad character; otherwise, you just get depressed. Make your real life as fun as possible.
author: Sophie Turner

quote: The funny thing is I'm not bothered or sad about being on my own - after all I've never had a husband.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: I'm not bothered or sad about being on my own - after all, I've never had a husband.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: So many times I should've stopped or could've stopped and didn't stop... So many kinds of people can get depressed and sad, and you know what? Everyone has that talent, that gift.
author: GloZell

quote: I'm sad that it's uncool or offensive to talk about environmental or human rights issues.
author: Grimes

quote: There's all this stuff that is happening in Edinburgh now, it's a sad attempt to create an Edinburgh society, similar to a London society, a highbrow literature celebrity society.
author: Irvine Welsh

quote: But you see, that's the gilded prison of fashion. We're riding in private jets, and meantime I was so incredibly, painfully sad and lonely.
author: Janice Dickinson

quote: I am an optimist, and I try to think that the light will always prevail in any situation, so it doesn't really make me sad about humanity because I think, deep down, everybody is full of love and light.
author: Thomas Gibson

quote: I think actually it's kind of sad because something I looked forward to just getting to the NFL growing up was just being able to have more fun, the rules loosen up, being able to celebrate.
author: Ezekiel Elliott

quote: I've met so many fans of daytime television who've watched the shows with their moms and grandmas and feel like they've known the characters their whole lives. It's sad for them to have to say goodbye to their favorite soaps and characters. We don't want that to happen to the 'Days' fans.
author: Alison Sweeney

quote: We don't live in the Garden. We live far from Eden. Every life is full of heartaches. Every life, frankly, is unspeakably sad.
author: John Eldredge

quote: Alison Carr on 'Homeland.' She was such great character to play, so clever and full of surprises. I was sad to see her go.
author: Miranda Otto

quote: Has Google appropriated the word 'search?' If so, I find it sad. Search is a deep human yearning, an ancient trope in the recorded history of human life.
author: Ellen Ullman

quote: That's why I've always loved country music. Whether it's sad, pumps you up, or it's breakup songs, it's all real-life things.
author: Cole Swindell

quote: Sometimes what we call tragedy, at least in the theater, are really case histories. They're based on the central figure, and things happen to that person, and they're called tragedy because they're extremely sad. But tragedy always has a glorious thing happen at the end of it. That's what the catharsis is.
author: Derek Walcott

quote: Commerce seems to be covering every aspect of our lives now. Which me, because I'm a romantic, is sad for me to say.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: It's incredible that they censor films. It's sad.
author: Dario Argento

quote: For a long time, censors have been cutting my works. This makes me so sad, because many times they will tell me, 'Television won't like, so we have to cut, cut, cut!'
author: Dario Argento

quote: Nothing gets on other people's nerves at the office more than a whistler. And the sad part is, these whistlers don't know they're doing it. Someone should, tactfully, tell the whistler how much it disrupts the office environment.
author: Letitia Baldrige

quote: I live on a train. I know - what a sad thing to admit. I am the New-Age Willy Loman. But there it is.
author: Christopher Buckley

quote: It's sad to me we can't be in a place where we can acknowledge we're all doing our best and respect the decisions other women make and even offer to help out.
author: Busy Philipps

quote: I'm very sad 'Life' wasn't a big hit, But it was undone by politics at NBC. It was intense. I moved my wife, and we had two children back to back. So working those hours and living abroad in L.A. was a handful. But it was a great experience.
author: Damian Lewis

quote: We're losing jobs in our manufacturing base, and those families that are going to be out of work over the holidays, that is a very sad thing. That is more governmental dependency. That is a reduced tax revenue for the state and for the federal government.
author: Anthony Scaramucci

quote: It's kind of sad, the way we've turned the entertainment of reading into a kind of psychic broccoli - something to feel guilty about if you don't force it on your face-making children while dutifully consuming a few token florets yourself.
author: Lynn Coady

quote: I've never met a woman who thinks they've got a good enough figure - however perfect they look - which is sad, because no one else can see these perceived flaws; they're entirely internal.
author: L'Wren Scott

quote: It's sad that some people who have one exciting moment spend the rest of their lives rehashing it.
author: Jonathan Kozol

quote: His death was the first time that Ed Wynn ever made anyone sad.
author: Red Skelton

quote: I know that there are coaches in the Bundesliga that have said in team meetings, 'Provoke Xhaka; he will eventually go ballistic.' I think that is sad. That, in my view, has nothing to do with football.
author: Granit Xhaka

quote: There is still so much drama in my life, but I'm not a sad person anymore.
author: Nikki Reed

quote: 'Baskets' is incredible - 'Baskets' is so funny and poignant and sad and dark.
author: Thomas Middleditch

quote: I've found that people feel very free to say insulting things, not about me personally, but about the things I believe. It's sad, because I really could care less where people are coming from, politically, religiously.
author: Patricia Heaton

quote: My solo album is dead and buried. We had the funeral. It was sad and I cried a lot but it made such a beautiful corpse that we had an open casket.
author: Shirley Manson

quote: When people ask if I'm going to be sad that 'The Office' is over, they don't even understand the depth of that question for me. It's an era of my life. No one would have known my name if it wasn't for the show.
author: John Krasinski

quote: There's never been a culture that wasn't obsessed with food. The sort of sad thing is that our obsession is no longer with food, but with the price of food.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: At 21, my career took a comedic turn when I was cast in a new Broadway play called 'Brooklyn Boy,' by Donald Margulies, which was equal parts funny and sad. I realized that the more seriously I expressed my character's feelings, the funnier the scene became.
author: Ari Graynor

quote: Whether it's something happy or sad, I like to share everything with my mother.
author: Karishma Tanna

quote: I do feel a bit dejected about my film career. I am sad that it didn't take off as expected. I didn't get my due as an actor. I have an attractive personality and good looks. But I don't know what went wrong? You need to stop thinking about such things and move on.
author: Karishma Tanna

quote: I talked to ex-wives of musicians of the '70s for research. They're the funniest people in the world, yet there is this sad, beautiful thing in their eyes that says they've seen more than they could ever possibly tell you.
author: Kate Hudson

quote: Jo Sykes made these incredible leather jackets: the leather was like butter. I had one, but I lost it at a wedding in Ibiza. It was so sad; I've not been able to replace.
author: Poppy Delevingne

quote: Not everyone's a perfect parent, but we do learn, and we grow from that. I'm not trying to be harsh on my family because it does make them sad to think back about how they used to be and some of their choices.
author: Farrah Abraham

quote: I grew up thinking that it's okay to be sad, angry, and express your emotions. I have also banged doors and fought, as I have seen my mom do that when she would fight with my dad. Everything that I've learnt is from them, so I've never struggled to express myself.
author: Alia Bhatt

quote: I have my way of dealing with lows in my career: I just go on a holiday. Coping with a failure of a film is like coping with a break-up. It's sad and heart-breaking, and it's not like I got over it right after my holiday; it took me some time.
author: Alia Bhatt

quote: My mom made me look in the mirror every day and say three things that I loved about myself. At first, I couldn't name anything. It was so sad. When my mom made me do that, I looked in the mirror, and I literally couldn't name one thing that I loved about myself.
author: Lauren Alaina

quote: You can think you're living in the moment and you're thankful, but when somebody comes face to face with you and says, 'I just lost my child,' or 'I have months to live, and thank you...' I'm of course sad for them, but I'm thankful that I gave them a gift and they're giving me a gift.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: I probably never would have been hired on Broadway had I not moved out to L.A. and pursued acting and film, which is sad, really.
author: Amy Adams

quote: It's a sad thing to contemplate, but I'm the last surviving cast member of 'The African Queen.'
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: I love the romcom. I thought I had a career playing the best friend. What happened to that? It's really sad to me.
author: Parker Posey

quote: It's hard to tell what an entire series is going to be based on the first few episodes, or even on the first season. And it's sad because you see great casts and good ideas that don't get that opportunity to grow and show what it could turn into.
author: Kaley Cuoco

quote: When I went to college, my mum was really sad, so she preserved my bedroom, like a weird time capsule.
author: Gia Coppola

quote: Yes's whole career was never really planned in any sort of way. It's always sad when a member leaves, but it's exciting when someone new comes in, and that regenerates the freshness of the band.
author: Chris Squire

quote: What I find sad is that the New Age movement is primarily a commercial undertaking. But it is answering to a human need.
author: Laura Esquivel

quote: I'm part of the party, getting the crowd fired up, singing songs, pouring drinks, whatever it takes to get them to have a good time. When I walk into the meet-and-greet, someone's always going to have a story, a sad story or a happy story.
author: Dierks Bentley

quote: I try to make an album that reflects what I love about country music. It's not just all about happy parties all the time. There are some sad songs.
author: Dierks Bentley

quote: My comedy is for children from three to 93. You do need a slightly childish sense of humour and if you haven't got that, it's very sad.
author: Norman Wisdom

quote: It's a sad day when Republicans will attack fellow Republicans on an issue as fundamental as free enterprise.
author: Doug Ducey

quote: I have learned so much from India: for instance, the use of aloe vera, which I use, and I find it sad when I see certain arts of oiling slowly fading away.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: In Britten or Berg, there's a tension between the sweet and the sour, between the familiar and the unfamiliar, the tonal and the atonal, the happy and the sad. That, to me, is what all western art is about - that tension. It's why we want to say anything at all.
author: Stephen Hough

quote: It's sad to be constantly judged for every move you make after your first success. If you wear your hair differently, you have changed.
author: Kriti Sanon

quote: I don't want success to affect me to that extent that I change or failure to that extent that I get sad, bitter and negative.
author: Arjun Kapoor

quote: The working standards on television in our country are really bad. The sad part is that many actors take this deal because it gets them money and recognition.
author: Barun Sobti

quote: When I was growing up, I heard horror stories about producers losing their houses overnight. No matter who the family is, hearing of them getting evicted is very sad.
author: Varun Dhawan

quote: The jury is not in, so we just don't know. But there are very strong indications that wormholes that a human could travel through are forbidden by the laws of physics. That's sad, that's unfortunate, but that's the direction in which things are pointing.
author: Kip Thorne

quote: It looks like I'm just gonna keep getting really, really happy and sad and embarrassed and excited and disappointed for the rest of my life, so let's just do that.
author: Jenny Slate

quote: Most of the time, we keep looking outside and feeling sad about what others have. Those are mere excuses.
author: Yami Gautam

quote: It's a sad commentary on our time - to use a phrase much favored by my late father - that people increasingly celebrate Christmas Day by going to the movies.
author: Michael Dirda

quote: Sad to say, multi-tasking is beyond me. I read one book at a time all the way through. If I'm reviewing the book, I have to write the review before I start reading any other book. I especially hate it when the phone rings and interrupts my train of thought.
author: Michael Dirda

quote: No matter how old and glorious the models, sad indeed is the woman who sees fashion as a means of self-expression rather than an agent of social control.
author: Julie Burchill

quote: It's sad to think right now, but probably the Russian and Chinese government know more about Hillary Clinton's e-mail server than do the members of the United States Congress. And - and that has put our national security at risk.
author: Scott Walker
