quote: I wrote the song For A Dancer for a friend of mine who died in a fire. He was in the sauna in a house that burned down, so he had no idea anything was going on. It was very sad.
author: Jackson Browne

quote: I try to be as positive as I can because I truly believe I am my feelings, and if I'm sad, if I have regrets, they will show up as illnesses, they will show up as cancers... I don't want that.
author: Marie Helvin

quote: You can't have an up without a down, a right without a left, a back without a front - or a happy without a sad.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: I fear that I won't work in the theatre again. I'm sad about that. But I won't retire.
author: Maggie Smith

quote: I was very depressed at a young age and felt like I didn't have agency towards that. Being 'female' meant I couldn't be that - I couldn't be angry, loud, sullen. Being sad meant I was weak.
author: Petra Collins

quote: Women's emotions are constantly labeled. Any slight deviation from 'pleasantness,' and we are labeled as hysterical. When we are angry, sad, depressed, or manic, we are immediately seen as unfeminine or ugly or weak.
author: Petra Collins

quote: Lotus's efforts around the Mac were pathetically unsuccessful, which is sad.
author: Mitch Kapor

quote: The Junction Point journey is over. To all those who've asked, or want to ask, I'm sad but excited for the future.
author: Warren Spector

quote: I was quite solitary for 'Hitman.' I was quite apart. He struck me as a very sad individual. There was a mournful quality there.
author: Rupert Friend

quote: It doesn't matter if you're sad or hung-over or lazy or tired - a workout will get your endorphins pumping, and you'll feel like a new person almost instantly.
author: Rachel Nichols

quote: It was a sad process for me to become a mom, and a long process. I felt so embarrassed that I couldn't have a biological child.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: The sad fact is, because we've had a failed policy and failed leadership, now we're having to rely on Russians and the Iranians to go into Syria to fight and destroy ISIS.
author: Mike McCaul

quote: It's sad when you see most of your friends in the business gone, like Tommy Cooper, Frankie Howard, Eric Morecambe, Roy Castle, Les Dawson. They were very dear to me. You no longer have the chance to bump into them at a celebrity do.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: It's really easy to do sad; you just put on some sad music and write dramatically - everybody can do that.
author: Jill Soloway

quote: If you're going to do a thing, do it fully so that no writing you give the world misrepresents you - so that nothing you put out there is like a sad regift you couldn't throw away and had to find a place for.
author: Lydia Millet

quote: I've cooked plenty of meals when I was sad, lonely, depressed, angry, bored, and/or under the weather. My primary aim in these circumstances is generally to cheer myself up, to fill my stomach with something warm so I can feel comforted and fed, usually just with a quick soup or an omelet.
author: Kate Christensen

quote: Eating by myself in my own apartment, single and alone again for the first time in many years, I should have felt, but did not feel, sad. Because I had taken the trouble to make myself a real dinner, I felt nurtured and cared for, if only by myself. Eating alone was freeing, too; I didn't have to make conversation.
author: Kate Christensen

quote: I'm a sucker for sad disco pop.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: A lot of my characters are underdogs or sad or lonely, but I had a comfortable, golden sort of childhood.
author: Anthony Browne

quote: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
author: Tamron Hall

quote: Music videos are notoriously long, not fun, grueling. You are known there as a dancer and it's kind of sad because dancers, in a lot of ways, are under-appreciated and kind of under-respected when it come to that so they don't necessarily treat you in a nice way when you do a music video.
author: Jenna Dewan

quote: When I need to cry, I think of very sad things, mostly about animals.
author: Quvenzhane Wallis

quote: I can't watch my first audition because it makes me too upset. I just think it is really sad. I look at myself and don't recognize myself. I do think fame and fortune changes people.
author: Rebecca Ferguson

quote: It's sad really, I think 'Freedom' would've done better, but it got shelved because of the pregnancy, so it might be something that might get revisited in the future; who knows?
author: Rebecca Ferguson

quote: You have to sound sad first of all, then maybe later you can sound good.
author: Steve Lacy

quote: It's the sad thing about entertainment, it's not always about who is the best.
author: Jake Roberts

quote: Even when I wasn't playing, I always had a smile on my face because if I acted sad or mad, it wouldn't help me.
author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

quote: Everything comes from your mind. You have to push yourself to get things going in your direction. If you are stubborn, nothing will help. If you are sad, nothing will help. You have to keep positive and to work very well for your next chance.
author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

quote: I don't really do sad, depressing songs.
author: Olly Murs

quote: If people are paying money to see me, then I want them to walk away from the show knowing they had a really great time. I want it to be very energetic and to have fun, sad, emotional and uplifting moments. I want it to have everything!
author: Olly Murs

quote: I'm not going to do a song that's really sad and thoughtful. Although I've done ballads like 'Dear Darlin',' I want to make them dance and be happy.
author: Olly Murs

quote: When I look back at those pictures of my mother performing - and listen to her recordings - it makes me sad to think that all of that joy she found in her work came to an end. I wish she hadn't had to make that sacrifice, even if it was for the benefit of my father and siblings and me.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: There's a rule of writing: if everything is funny, nothing is funny; if everything is sad, nothing is sad. You want that contrast.
author: J. Michael Straczynski

quote: My favorite pieces that I've written, either for St. Lucia or for myself, have always had a transporting quality to them, where they take you out of the moment and somewhere positive that feels nostalgic and happy but sad at the same time.
author: St. Lucia

quote: Football is a sad game.
author: George Best

quote: Everyone finds my work super sad. I never do. I always find it uplifting in a weird way.
author: Jeff Lemire

quote: What I really tried to do with Helen was make her show this sad side of her. She was married off at 16, was so young and living in this castle that can't leave because of how she looks, and married to a man she hates and three times her age.
author: Diane Kruger

quote: The second you become an actress, people take the licence to make many assumptions about you. You're in trouble if you interact with a director/actor. You're in even more trouble if you don't. When I started out, a single YouTube comment would make me sad for days, and I'd wonder how people could say such nasty things about me.
author: Nithya Menen

quote: Pageants are already ridiculous and sad, I think.
author: Casey Wilson

quote: What I think is funny is when people, despite tragic situations, are still hopeful, still trying. It's sweet and sad - and, to me, hilarious.
author: Casey Wilson

quote: I enjoy being recognized. I'll be very sad if people stop recognizing me. I'll be very sad if I'm not interviewed, because that's a very amazing process.
author: Anupam Kher

quote: I'm always sad when Dad doesn't like my columns. He waits for them every week and usually likes them, in which case he doesn't say a word - it's only if he's critical that he bothers to call.
author: Sayed Kashua

quote: I'm sad, upset, and disheartened with the trolling that happens on social media... At the end of the day, this whole homophobia is so disheartening and upsetting. And then they say, 'Why don't you speak about your sexuality? You could be iconic in this country.' But I don't want to be iconic anywhere. I want to live my life.
author: Karan Johar

quote: I love jazz music and sad music. I'm a sentimental guy. I'm a romantic guy.
author: Fred Durst

quote: In my kids' school, the married family is an anomaly... which I do think is sad. I do believe in marriage.
author: Marcia Gay Harden

quote: A lot of my movies have come to be thought about only years after the fact, and I'm sad about that but also happy about it in a way, as it's given them longevity.
author: Nicolas Roeg

quote: I'm so glad I spent 10 years being sad and lonely.
author: Caitlin Moran

quote: Once, after I had just worked out, I hopped on the elevator at the gym only to look up and see Conan O'Brien on it with me. I was so sad. I was all sweaty, but I love him so much, and I couldn't help but nerd out on him.
author: Ashlan Gorse Cousteau

quote: I always feel sad when I come to the end of a book.
author: Claire Tomalin

quote: There are things you're supposed to learn in life. My biggest regret was terminating a pregnancy when I was about 18. Every day, I think about who that baby would be now; it still makes me sad.
author: Suzi Quatro

quote: The big thing for me is to make films that you feel, whether you feel happy, whether you feel sad, whether you feel sick; it's to make the audience feel so that the next day they remember what they saw.
author: Asif Kapadia

quote: I find America falling in love with a TV show flattering and interesting, but at the same time a little sad.
author: David Schwimmer

quote: It's a sad fact that a lot of those countries who haven't been involved in the war in Iraq have taken far more responsibility for rehoming people displaced by the war than Britain has done.
author: Romola Garai

quote: Even when something sad or tragic happens, I find a way to look at it in a positive light. People who don't have a sense of humor must be so sad all the time.
author: Zach Anner

quote: The old know what they want; the young are sad and bewildered.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: With my schedule being so crazy, I can't call every day or hang out with my friends like I used to and that's definitely sad.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: Someone once accused me of being like Eliot Ness. I sad no sir, I'm not E.N., but I can promise you that I'm not Al Capone!
author: Robert Stack

quote: Depression is internal. The upswings and downswings have pretty much nothing to do with what's going on in the external world. It's not like something sad happens to you and then you feel sad. Good things happen, but you feel sad anyway.
author: Graham Moore

quote: People are getting away from the whole album experience, it's true. I think that's sad. Maybe I'm just saying that because I'm an old fart. But I can't help it - albums are what I grew up with, and I still love them.
author: Alex Lifeson

quote: What I think is sad about the rom-com genre is that it has adopted this pejorative title. I think the reason why there haven't been as many great ones is because we are fighting against the genre itself. If it is a romantic comedy then snuggle up to the fact that it can be a really earnest, refreshing feeling to feel good after a movie.
author: Lake Bell

quote: I never get scared making these kinds of movies because it's all make-believe, but I did cry when I saw the finished version of Man On Fire because it is so sad.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: The hardest thing is at the end you have to say bye to all these people who you have worked with for so many months. It was really sad not to see them anymore. But you have the parties that you go to and you get to see them, like the premieres and the screenings.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: I like everything perfect. Everything has to be neat. My sister is 5, and she's more messy than I am. I make my bed every morning, everything's perfect. My shoes are all arranged. It's sad. I'm a little like Ray, a little bit.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: My mother has stories of leaving me in the bath as small kid, like a 3-year-old, and there being mirrors on the side, and her going to get a towel and coming back in, and me making faces at myself, like, 'Now I'm happy. Now I'm sad.'
author: Allison Tolman

quote: We all suffer in our own way; like, life is miserable. And I'm not, 'Oh, I'm a stand-up who's sad,' but the reality is that just about everyone is quietly unhappy. I don't think that pertains to comedians specifically. I think most people look at themselves in the mirror and are not happy with what they see.
author: Nick Kroll

quote: I find Spike Jones' movies to be really very inventive and funny, but they're really sad and touching and really key into the different facets of the human experience.
author: Nick Kroll

quote: I'm a person who likes these sort of movies... sad but moving 'art movies' that normally are at a festival and then they go to a small art house theater and disappear.
author: Zach Braff

quote: Every day, when I am working with my boys, I tell them as long as you put in your best efforts, I am there to back you. But the day I find your energy flagging on the field, the day I find you have not put in your best, that's when I will be really upset and sad.
author: Nita Ambani

quote: When I remember my mother, it makes me really sad. But, when I remember my father, it makes me smile.
author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

quote: I've always been drawn to Marilyn Monroe, but certain aspects of her story may be too sad to tell.
author: Sherilyn Fenn

quote: I've worked with some people that just spent hours and hours and hours in the mirror, and just so much importance is based on that. And I do find that sad.
author: Sherilyn Fenn

quote: If the IAAF feel that is the right way to go for TV rights and everything, the rule will stay. As much as I want to be on the podium, tonight is a sad night for athletics.
author: Kim Collins

quote: Sometimes I was sad, sometimes happy. Just on and off. Always I felt welcome. It's just, you know, sometimes as a human being, you cannot always be happy. You do good things, you do bad things, people talk.
author: Caster Semenya

quote: I guess it's sad that anybody, regardless of profession, that they're in this country, would take a shot at our military.
author: Jeff Fisher

quote: I am sad to leave so many friends at Manchester United. But I am grateful to the club for allowing me the chance to take up the challenge at Chicago Fire.
author: Bastian Schweinsteiger

quote: People say, oh it's a shame, you're not nostalgic about the '60s. Well actually, it's quite good, when you think of it. Wouldn't it be sad if I was sitting here wishing it back?
author: Robert Wyatt

quote: As a writer, or as a filmmaker, you have to present yourself, and part of what yourself is is what you're interested in, or what you think is funny, or what you think is sad, or what you think is horrible.
author: Charlie Kaufman

quote: My father's death, my move, and my frightening and difficult delivery created a tremendous amount of stress, pain, and sadness for me. I was practically devastated beyond recovery.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: You start to fall in love with characters as you work with them, and anytime that you care about your characters and you realize that you're gonna have to kill them, that fear creeps in. It's sad. It's scary, and it's also sad. Because you like these people.
author: Drew Goddard

quote: I feel that World Cup cricket should be played like football in which all the 160 countries take part. If only a handful of countries are going to keep on playing in the World Cup without making the game popular, I will be a sad man.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: The 2012 presidential campaign's turn away from the classic, straight-up, American election - where the candidate who gets the most votes nationwide wins - is another sad reminder of the extreme political polarization distorting today's politics. No one talks about a 50-state strategy for winning the presidency these days.
author: Juan Williams

quote: You see guys going up to girls in bars and saying, 'Oh, can I show you a trick?' It's a tool. I find it kind of sad; it breaks my heart a little bit. They should try to use their own personalities. It sort of smacks of using magic as a crutch, which is not what it should be.
author: Keith Barry

quote: So many schools are getting rid of music programs and it's really sad because I know that when I started singing and stuff it was something that I always wanted to do and I never believed in myself to be able to do it.
author: Hilary Duff

quote: Nobody destroys people - people destroy themselves, and it's very, very sad.
author: John Catsimatidis

quote: Everybody has their favorite sad songs. That's part of what I love so much about country music. Country music is never afraid to go with a sad song.
author: Chris Young

quote: I'm a sucker for a sad song.
author: Chris Young

quote: Dwight is a sad clown. You've seen those paintings of sad clown.
author: Rainn Wilson

quote: I ate cucumbers and saltines - not because I wanted to look a certain way, but because I was so sad my appetite disappeared.
author: Betty Gilpin

quote: Even modern English people are imperious, superior, ridden by class. All of the hypocrisy and the difficulties that are endemic in being British also make it an incredibly fertile place culturally. A brilliant place to live. Sad but true.
author: Pete Townshend

quote: It's sad when people break up.
author: Pete Townshend

quote: The world would be a very sad place if readers could only love one story.
author: Sylvia Day

quote: I ran track in college. And that team, that all-lady team that I was on, I can remember just being so incredibly sad that I knew we were all going to leave each other after we graduated and that our lives would change. And even though I was the bridesmaid at all their weddings and stuff like that, it's just not the same, right?
author: Kay Cannon

quote: Well in the end the world can crank itself up to sanctions, as it has with Zimbabwe, another sad case.
author: Helen Clark

quote: I was sad to see anybody leave, we had a very nice family on that show. I was very sad to see momma go, Victoria and especially Linda. My god that was my wife on the show, in fact my wife calls her wife.
author: Larry Hagman

quote: Listeners instinctively detect that when we lower the usual pitch of our voice, we are sad, and when we raise it, we are angry or fearful.
author: Leonard Mlodinow

quote: It's so sad to see how few people in the Obama administration have any private sector experience.
author: Foster Friess

quote: This is going to sound really sad, but I didn't really have any heartthrobs when I was growing up. I was a bit of a geek.
author: Gugu Mbatha-Raw

quote: You can't be new for too long. You want to just respectfully disappear. It's a bit sad sometimes. Michael Jordan retired like a god, and then he came back... We don't want to go out like that.
author: Watkin Tudor Jones

quote: I happen to be interested in watching a face age. I like faces of women aging so it makes me personally quite sad. That's a beautiful gift from God. If people don't want to see that anymore then I won't be in anymore movies.
author: Debra Winger

quote: It's always sad if anybody you know has a personal problem.
author: Lee Child

quote: Indeed, it is quite sad to see the United States becoming the main exporter of arms. It is quite sad to look at the U.S. government subsidizing arms exports.
author: Óscar Arias

quote: I'm very sensitive. I remember, as a kid at school, if someone in the classroom was sad or angry, it could have a great impact on me.
author: Aurora

quote: Even if my songs are quite sad or quite dark, I don't want my songs to make people sad. It's very important for me that all my songs have some kind of hope or light.
author: Aurora

quote: Sadness is a super important thing not to be ashamed about but to include in our lives. One of the bigger problems with sadness or depression is there's so much shame around it. If you have it you're a failure. You are felt as being very unattractive.
author: Mike Mills

quote: My experience, with both my parents, is that grief has a lot of down, sad things, but I was also really emotionally raw, in the first year after each of them passed. Flowers smelled more intensely, my relationships were hotter, and I was more willing to risk. I was going for it a lot more. I was 'unsober' and I wasn't playing by my rules.
author: Mike Mills

quote: At the outset, I think that one should be natural, not just when it comes to writing but in every area of life. If you try to be something that you are not just to impress others, then it's a rather sad life.
author: Amish Tripathi

quote: I've never really been met with indifference, where they say, 'Who cares?' I think that's what good art is supposed to do. It's not supposed to make you feel good about your own prejudices and your own values; it's supposed to open you up in some way and get you outraged or make you happy or make you sad or whatever it's going to do.
author: T. C. Boyle

quote: 51st State was one that I loved doing because the character was so out there, and in a way I was sad to leave the character behind. I'm afraid I could never be that cool in real life!
author: Emily Mortimer

quote: Just because I'm talking about something that might have been a sad or painful situation doesn't mean that I'm sad or tortured 24 hours a day any more than anybody else is.
author: Lucinda Williams

quote: Dance has helped me overcome a lot of personal challenges. If I feel sad or depressed, I just go to the set and dance. It makes me feel alive.
author: Remo D'Souza

quote: But now Americans, they felt a sense of peace and protection because they've been separated by so many thousands of miles of ocean. And you know, the fact that it's come to the U.S. like this is so sad, and yet you know, what can you do? It's here.
author: Patty Hearst

quote: I've traveled around the country and I read local newspapers and all of that, and it's a sad, sad thing to go from city to city and see the small newspapers and they're tiny. They're tiny not only in size but also in scope.
author: Jim Lehrer

quote: I could never really choose a favorite book, but whenever I'm asked what my favorite movie is, I always say 'Withnail & I,' a British film from 1987. It's funny and sad and absolutely gorgeous to look at. It's the film I can watch over and over again.
author: Lisa Lutz

quote: I'm quite an odd little part of the Venn diagram. I'm not a movie star and beautiful in that way. I do an odd thing that's funny and sad, and my face and my old body can take that.
author: Tamsin Greig

quote: Yes, as an oppressed people, American Indians have this epic burden, but first and foremost, they're human: sometimes a mess, sometimes funny or sad, at times very wise, and other times not wise at all - a lot like me.
author: Alexandra Fuller

quote: A lot of actors try to sabotage other actors, and that's sad because then you're never going to get that beautiful scene.
author: Erica Durance

quote: I was friends with Susan Sontag the last four years of her life. She had this amazing charisma and so much energy, but she had a sad little funeral in Montparnasse in Paris.
author: Marina Abromovic

quote: When you think about such fine actors as Maggie Smith or Michael Gambon, they do all mediums. I think it would be quite sad and a bit dull just to have to stick to one. I like all of them.
author: Keeley Hawes

quote: Informed by our sad experience of history, we require nothing short of a foundation for lasting democracy.
author: Ibrahim Babangida

quote: People just don't like me, and it's unfortunate, because I'm trying to get people to come down and visit New Zealand. I'm an ambassador for New Zealand... it's kind of sad.
author: Steven Adams

quote: We can't shame women for trying to be beautiful. That's so mean and unfair. But there's a part of me that thinks it's really sad, too. It's very complicated.
author: Marilyn Minter

quote: I didn't want to be on the losing side. I was fed up with Jewish weakness, timidity and fear. I didn't want any more Jewish sentimentality and Jewish suffering. I was sickened by our sad songs.
author: Lionel Blue

quote: I'm not sad about any of my life. It's so unconventional. It doesn't look anything like I thought it would.
author: Edie Falco

quote: In Mississippi, you don't admit that you're gay. It's just an awkward thing down South, which is sad.
author: Lance Bass

quote: It's not nice to say it - I know female musicians, but not so many rappers. I can't think of one I idolize, which is sad, but I'm hoping that will change.
author: Awkwafina

quote: I honestly think I was an Indian living in the time of the Trail of Tears. Something like that. Every time I read books about back then, I get so devastatingly sad, so, so... I feel such a deep connection to it.
author: Q'orianka Kilcher

quote: If there's another iPhone that's better, that's sad for my old iPhone. But it means we get to use a better one.
author: Roger Ver

quote: I was a fan of 'Six Feet Under' and was very sad when it ended, so I was not ready to switch my allegiance to another show. So I was like, 'I'm not watching this 'True Blood.' Then a friend got a bootleg copy of the first four episodes, and by the third one, I was irrevocably hooked.
author: Denis O'Hare

quote: 'm really proud of 'Sad, Sad World' because it manages to state a very complex paradox of an emotion that I experienced when I had children, which is this great happiness and this great intensity, but with that intensity comes a deeper understanding of the world.
author: Jamie Cullum

quote: There is something sad about clothes laid in a tomb of trunks.
author: Suzy Menkes

quote: I had all these tapes in my closet that I had shot years ago with my friend Jean-Michel Basquiat. I was working on a film about him when he died, and then I just put everything away. It was too sad.
author: Tamra Davis

quote: Even today, England is a very repressed, repressive country, and there's pressure to be kind of a certain way, so people do things that ultimately make them sad.
author: Ben Whishaw

quote: It's much easier to write when you're sad. But you can end up isolated and depressed because you almost need to put yourself in that situation to have that angst to write from.
author: Natalie Imbruglia

quote: Divorce was very sad, obviously, but now I've gotten over it.
author: Natalie Imbruglia

quote: As a songwriter I hate this whole, 'If it's a sad song, it has to sound like a sad song thing.' And that goes all the way back to my days with the Format. I'm an insane narcissist, so if I have to get something off my chest, I'll get something off my chest.
author: Nate Ruess

quote: I take my inspiration for the song writing from little experiences, not even if I've experienced them myself but say if something has made me sad, I will use that emotion. I just use everyday life and write about it.
author: Pixie Lott

quote: I think people tend to forget that as celebrities we are still human. We have the same emotions - we cry, we have fun, we laugh, we get sad, and we get hurt. When something is written about you, which millions of people are reading, and it is not true, imagine how hurtful it can be.
author: Sania Mirza

quote: We have real cliched ideas of what prison life is like. It is not a happy place. It's a desperate, sad situation.
author: Powers Boothe

quote: Ideally, I would love to mix singing and acting, but you can only be a pop star for so many years. I mean, at 30 it's a little bit sad, right?
author: Rachel Stevens

quote: I think a lot of people think that my parents' deaths is why I write such sad songs, but that's not true. Those songs may just be the woman I am.
author: Shelby Lynne

quote: Making people laugh is so much more difficult than making them sad. Too much fiction defaults to the somber, the tragic. This is because sad endings are easy in comparison - happy endings aren't at all simple to earn, especially when writing to an audience jaded by them.
author: Stephen Graham Jones

quote: I will be very sad if I ever get to the point where I think, 'Oh no, another dress from Armani.' I want to be still screaming my head off when it arrives.
author: Emily Berrington

quote: It's nice to be with someone, but I don't think you need to be in a relationship to feel complete. That would be really sad.
author: Kristin Davis

quote: I do gravitate towards the sad songs because I find them to be more of a challenge for me from a writing perspective. There are things about those songs that do touch people in a way that a fun song can't.
author: Luke Combs

quote: Elaine is just in pain. I think Elaine has become very, very sad woman. She is someone who is in deep need of many hours of analysis and I like to think that I'm not that type of person.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Our family has gone through a very difficult time. My husband and I have taken the brunt of it. I've never known what it truly felt like to be so sad and desperate inside.
author: Tracey Gold

quote: It's sad that my daughter will get attention because of her daddy. I'm already watching her run around the house and pick up microphones. It's scary.
author: Bow Wow

quote: Lately, I've been a little sad that I'm not a gay man.
author: Gina Gershon

quote: In a sad twist of fate, the bill to reauthorize the Patriot Act was debated on the floor of the House of Representatives the same day that terrorists struck again.
author: Jim Sensenbrenner

quote: There is no such thing as death. In nature nothing dies. From each sad remnant of decay, some forms of life arise so shall his life be taken away before he knoweth that he hath it.
author: Charles Mackay

quote: With myself, how to pass time becomes sometimes the question - unavoidably, though it strikes me as a thing unspeakably sad in a life so short as ours.
author: Walter Pater

quote: I've got so much to do, I don't have time to sit down and be sad.
author: Norma McCorvey

quote: I don't buy art just to make artists happy any more than I want to make them sad if I sell their work.
author: Charles Saatchi

quote: You put a song on the record or on tape and you stop singing it. You just don't sit around and sing it anymore unless you're performing. That's kind of sad.
author: Rick Danko

quote: I found out about reviews early on. They're mostly written by sad men on bad afternoons. That's probably why I'm less angry than some writers, who are so narcissistic they consider every line of every review, even a thoughtful one, as major treason.
author: Barry Hannah

quote: All my work shares a kind of balance between black comedy and sad and despairing melancholy.
author: Martin McDonagh

quote: It was sad when Sid Vicious died... I was freaked out when Phil Lynott died from Thin Lizzy. I cried. It was too crazy.
author: Dee Dee Ramone

quote: It makes me sad that corporations and media and Hollywood conspire to make people feel terrible about their bodies from the second they wake up, so I sort of try to subversively undercut that.
author: Rob Delaney

quote: It's a sad day in this country when you can't talk about law and order unless they want to call you a racist.
author: George Wallace

quote: Getting a book published made me feel a little bit sad. I felt driven by the need to write a book, rather than the need to write. I needed to figure out what was important to me as a writer.
author: Nicole Krauss

quote: What's sad is that there is an addictive quality to that, to believing your own hype; to allowing yourself to become validated by others and no longer by yourself. That's the danger of celebrity.
author: Giovanni Ribisi

quote: It's a sad day when a woman being funny and interested in science is considered newsworthy.
author: Elise Andrew

quote: You have to let it all hang out, let go of the ideas that were more comfortable and embrace some of the sadness in your life.
author: Madeleine Peyroux

quote: Though I know he loves me, tonight my heart is sad; his kiss was not so wonderful as all the dreams I had.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: The reason for the sadness of this modern age and the men who live in it is that it looks for the truth in everything and finds it.
author: Edmond de Goncourt

quote: Tears are the natural penalties of pleasure. It is a law that we should pay for all that we enjoy.
author: William Gilmore Simms

quote: There's so much to argue about. That was the goal with 'Really Really.' Somebody asked me once, 'How should I feel when I leave?' and I said, 'Hopefully, you're talkative.' I don't really care if you're happy or sad or loved it or hated it or hate me. The goal is that you have something to say, that you have a response.
author: Paul Downs Colaizzo

quote: I think it's sad that movies and television have caused the theatre to fade as a popular art form. I hope to get young people into the theatre and expose them to Shakespeare.
author: Kelly McGillis

quote: It's a sad moment, really, when parents first become a bit frightened of their children.
author: Ama Ata Aidoo

quote: Everything's complicated, even those things that seem flat in their bleakness or sadness.
author: Nick Hornby
